summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1406, for the improvement of North Thirty-eight Street, from Wallingford Avenue to Corliss Avenue, all in the City of Seattle, by grading and curbing the same, and by constructing concrete walks thereon, under Ordinance No. 15289 and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
